GSD.description: color.js had an infinite loop added by the primary developer in version 1.4.1 and 6.6.6 which was released on GitHub and NPM. Additionally the GitHub repo was wiped of all files. This appears to have been done intentionally in commit 074a0f8ed0c31c35d13d28632bd8a049ff136fb6. It has since been fixed and color.js version 1.4.2 has been released and it appears that both GitHub and NPM have locked out the original developer account and reverted the changes.
